author: crackawhat1
comment: Fantastic watch face. I have two minor suggestions, both related to ambient mode. An option for a "higher quality" that shows the texture background and better graphics in ambient mode would be nice. Obviously this would drain more battery, but the g watch r and urbane batteries are monsters and could most likely handle it. Additionally, there is a bug with the burn in prevention and colors. One of the dots got moved almost off of the screen and turned red rather than my defined color of mustard.

author: Yo JR
comment: I tried the free for a couple hours.  Loved it.    Then decided to upgrade. Even told my colleagues about it.  Here are some issues I'd like to see addressed.  Battery life lasts about 4hrs (moto360).  Also could you add a way to save preferences?  As expected, I am redoing my settings.  Great work!

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello. Yes, 4 hours is very very small. Normal discharge should be within 2.5-4 % per hour. Try to restart your watch and phone. Unfortunately, there is no technical ability to remember user settings. This limitation of the program WatchMaker. The developers promise to implement this feature in the future.

title: Perfect except...

author: Assaf Lev
comment: Loved the free version,  so I decided to purchase the full. Now I have to restart my phone every day - otherwise my watches battery depletes in 6hours. Second problem is that the settings are not being saved - I change the color and a few hours later it goes back to blue.  Happens every time!
title: Settings are not saved, forces me to restart my phone every day

author: Darren F
comment: Then I realised I couldn't see it too well outside.  Would like the ability to change background colour.   Thay would make it amazing.   Has all the details I need to hand.   Just wish I could use this face more,  but there are other ones which are clearer during daylight hours.  I find myself shielding this one to be able to view it
title: It's nice for a bit

author: Renbo
comment: Not great, why do the calendar events dissappear when the watch dim (goes into ambient mode). It should be possible to decide what will dissappear in ambient mode. Also, its too dark in ambient mode, even with highest "brightness"
title: Good

author: Ben Spratt
comment: After update to 5.1.1 there is a lot of lag. Needs work. I did restart both watch and phone but it did not help. Lag appears to be only with Vizor Watch. Other Watchmaker faces work fine.

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content:
Hello. Try restarting your device and the phone.

UPD: Lags appear only with this dial, or with all the WatchMaker dials?

UPD2: I take your point. I will prepare an update

author: Sir Lucario
comment: I have took the time to look at watchface for a few hours, and I can't find anything as perfect as this. It combines accessibility with quality perfectly
title: Just wow

author: Hariprasad Shevire
comment: Weather not gets updated and steps always stuck, not at all accurate. Kindly fix this. Otherwise, refund the money.

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content:
Hello! The update of the weather depends on the program WatchMaker. The weather may not be updated if the program WatchMaker cannot determine your location. Try setting it manually in the settings WatchMaker.

Number of steps received from the watch sensor. Google Fit gets data from your phone. On this Google Fit data differ from data on the clock.

title: Need to fix some issues

author: Michael Soliman
comment: I'm pretty impressed by how much information and functionality was packed into a display and interface that is clean and simple.  I'd give it 5 stars if I can switch to F instead of C in terms of temperature units.  Great job!  UPDATE: Thanks for the tip! +1 star. :)

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello. The unit for the temperature switch in the WatchMacker program settings

title: Lots of information cleanly displayed

author: Jesslyn Hendrix
comment: Sucks the heck out of your watch battery, but pretty while it does.  As a previous purchaser pointed out, he got 4 hours.  He was accurate as heck.  I put my watch on at 6 when leaving for work and it was almost dead (10%) by lunch time.

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello, Jesslyn. Normal battery drain should be located within 2.5-4% per hour. If your device runs out of power quickly, try to restart it and your phone. I am currently working on optimizing this dial.

author: Marvin Bartchlett
comment: The face looks great other than the step counter reading less steps than the Google fit app.

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hi, Marvin! Unfortunately, it is a technical limitation. The step count on the watch receives data from its own sensor built into your watch. This sensor responds to vibrations. But Google Fit gets its data from your phone. There are other sensors, including GPS, and a different method of counting. These data may not be the same, alas.

title: Looks great, step counter is always wrong

author: Christopher Boeh
comment: Great watchface.  The site where you get the editable version isn't working is there anywhere else I would be able to get it?

author: JaRed Beats
comment: Great watch face. Satisfied with the purchase. All the info I need at a glance . My only suggestion would be more color options and my time keeps changing from 12hr to 50hr. Keep up the good work!

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello. Maybe color will be added in future updates. Unfortunately, at the moment the program WatchMacker not able to remember the settings of the watch faces. On this each time you restart the watch face returns to initial state. I'm looking for solutions.

title: Looks Great.

author: Dennis Goodman
comment: Love the watch face, but the digital time won't stick on the 12 hour setting. Also the weather can't be changed too Fahrenheit, or give us the option to remove the weather. Thanks
title: Great looking watch face, but!

author: Kash Hussain
comment: Love it so far. I would like the option to change the vizorwatch logo to custom wording and maybe heart rate instead of step counter but it's a very good effort.
title: Brilliant

author: Daniel Blair
comment: NOT appearing correctly on 5.1.1, and would like option to remove stopwatch, etc  Specifically, the weather sun is in the center of the watch, can't be toggled. I've uninstalled and re installed, to no avail

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello. What does not appear correctly? Describe the problem in more detail, please.  UPD Bug with the weather is that for some reason your program WatchMaker cannot determine your location, and as a result cannot get weather data from provider. Go to settings WatchMaker and under weather set your location manually - should help.

author: William Shimmin
comment: This is by far my favourite watch face. Now if only the digital clock could show a second time zone it would be perfect.
title: My favourite watch face

author: Simon DeAlmeida
comment: The free watch face shows a square watch. However the premium version has a round watch. How do I get the square watch for my Sony smartwatch 3?
title: Great watch face

author: Michael Woods
comment: Nice features but the dim mode is offset in random directions. Reported it to the developer with no response.

author: Vineeth Pillai
comment: I am really enjoying my watch after installing this watch face. Ultimate one!!!!
title: Awesome watchface

author: iKHMER
comment: I love this face, next update should have compass.
title: Super

author: Adam Payne
comment: Fantastic watch face, keep up the good work.
title: Superb!

author: Rudy M 3
comment: Wish you could change the weather from Celsius and Fahrenheit

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello. Switch between units of measurement of temperature is done in the program settings WatchMaker.

title: It's decent

author: Mohammad Abutaleb
comment: Add custom icon to Run an App from Watch Face directly...

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello. I'm thinking of how to implement it

title: Suggestion

author: Shaun McMillan
comment: These people are on fire, great work again, love this face.

author: Tim Osterhouse
comment: Perfect

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello, Tim. Normal battery drain should be located within 2.5-4% per hour. If your device runs out of power quickly, try to restart it and your phone.

author: Luis Gabriel Gerena
comment: Love the watch and design but needs a better dim mode in my opinion
title: Almost great

author: Martin Fojtik
comment: I must say, I am impressed by this face. Perfect combination of functionality and design. But why the hell to have both 12h and 24h time on screen with latest update. Please, do have only one time format displayed. I dont care which, or make it a choice in settings. Thanks for your work. M.

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello! This is still a compromise. I'm working on the ability to customize the time format. While it can be considered as a feature. )

title: Superb watchface

author: Matt Shelby
comment: Love this face, all the info I need without looking cramped or in the way. Great work.
title: Great face

author: Joey Bourgoin
comment: Very nice face, excellent features.

author: IDLE 0095
comment: Watch Maker is horrible.  Do not bother with this.

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content:
Why do you need it and, more importantly, why me? To abandon its own brand for the sake of evaluation of five stars? Are you serious?

UPD: Very interesting turn of events. Well, so be it. Or anything to worry about. Good luck!

title: Horrible

author: Chase Page
comment: I would prefer to be able to alter this in Watchmaker.  Since I cannot,  refunded,  deleted,  back to making my own.
title: Like the layout
